name: Nuve, Inc.
description: Developer of a sensor-based technology and a mobile application designed to prevent the theft of fuel and cargo. The company utilizes sensors technology to offer an asset protection system with real-time notifications, enabling businesses to better protect, control and monitor their cargo.
